mapper.sql: rule_id, rule_name, rule_desc, reg_id, device_id, operand, operator, severity, del_mark
mapper.select: select a.rule_id, a.rule_name, a.rule_desc, a.reg_id, b.reg_name, a.device_id, a.operand, a.operator, a.severity, a.del_mark from gywlw_warning_rules a, gywlw_reg_info b where a.device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.reg_id=b.reg_id
mapper.insert:
insert into gywlw_warning_rules
rule_id,
rule_name,
rule_desc,
reg_id,
device_id,
operand,
operator,
severity,
del_mark,

mapper.update:
update gywlw_warning_rules
rule_name = #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule_desc = #{ruleDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_id = #{regId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operand = #{operand,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
severity = #{severity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del_mark = #{delMark,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update gywlw_warning_rules set rule_name = #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_desc = #{ruleDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_id = #{regId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operand = #{operand,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, severity = #{severity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_mark = #{delMark,jdbcType=TINYINT} where rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
